room_title: Escape room "The Lost Soul" by Escaped In Time in Colorado Springs
room_description: It is the year 1705, a time when piracy is well and alive! The notorious Pirate Edward Benedictine has taken you prisoner, locked in the brig, he keeps you captive. You know of a treasure hidden somewhere in the ship. Can you find a way to free yourselves and escape with the elusive treasure? Or will you join the crew of the Lost Soul... forever?
